Content.Text:
<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You weren't joking when you said you wanted us
to get back together, right?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I know I said that I wanted us to go back to
being friends, but I just haven't been able to
forget you.
<PAGE>
To be honest, I didn't really want us to go back
to being friends. I want...more.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_HEART1_R>So, yeah. Let's give this couple thing another
try.
<PAGE>
<ACTION_RIBBON><FACE_LAUGH>And this time, let's be so awesomely lovey-
dovey that breaking up won't even cross our
minds!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Man, this is almost a dream! I never thought the
day would come when I'd get back together with
you, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I'm so happy right now, it's almost scaring me.
Is it really okay for something this great to
happen? I'm not gonna die tomorrow, am I?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Anyway! How about we give each other new
nicknames?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Since we're getting a fresh start here, it seems
the perfect way to mark the occasion, don't you
think?
Not really.
Sure. Let's see...

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So you want me to call you <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE> now?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Great! I'm looking forward to being back
together with you again, <MYNAME>. This is
gonna be awesome!

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
<MYNAME>, don't you think you might be taking
this sort of relationship too lightly?
<PAGE>
Getting together and breaking up are not like
flipping a switch. You can't simply bounce back
and forth from one to the other.
<PAGE>
If you are approaching this confession too
lightly, and think we can just break up again if it
doesn't work out...
<PAGE>
Then I cannot accept this ring from you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But if that isn't what you think, if you truly want
to give our relationship another try...
<PAGE>
Then please show me that ring again,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>All right...I accept.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>To be honest, lately all I have been able to think
about is how to bring you back to me.
<PAGE>
<ACTION_RIBBON>So this makes me far happier than you could
imagine. I hope this time, we can be together for
good.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now then, as we are significant others once
again, shall we take this opportunity to give
ourselves new nicknames?
Let's keep our names the same.
I wanna change my name.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You are all right with me calling you
<BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE>?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Excellent. <MYNAME>, let me say again, thank
you. I look forward to us being together for a
long, long time.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I know people say that women change their
minds a lot, but this? What brought this about?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>Sorry, but you're too late. Whatever feelings I
had for you are long gone!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>...At least, that's probably what I should say...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But I guess what I feel for you isn't something
that goes away that easily.
<PAGE>
You could probably say I don't know when to
give up, but I haven't had eyes for anyone but
you. I've known my answer from the start...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_HEART1_R><ACTION_RIBBON>That answer is "yes." Let's try this again,
<MYNAME>. Thank you for choosing me...once
more.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, I know. Since we're back in the saddle, how
about we commemorate it by giving ourselves
new nicknames?
Let's just stick with what works.
Sure! Let's see...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE>, then?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Okay. Great. I'm looking forward to being with
you again, <MYNAME>. Forever, this time!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Sheesh. Only you could string me along like
this, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Was this your plan all along? If so, it's an
impressive one. However, I like to think I'm not
entirely letting you drag me around by my nose.
<PAGE>
But you're always so very serious about
everything, it makes it so hard for me to...I don't
know, doubt you, I guess?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Of course, in the end, I'm the only one who
could ever completely keep up with you.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_HEART1_R>All right. I accept. Let's bring back what we had.
Let's make the magic happen once again.
<PAGE>
<ACTION_RIBBON>Prepare yourself, though, for I will no longer let
you go so easily.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
...So, how about we use this opportunity to give
ourselves new nicknames?
Let's not and say we did.
Let's!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So...<BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE>, then?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Excellent.
<PAGE>
Now, then, <MYNAME>. I am very much looking
forward to being together with you again. For
good, this time.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
First you wanted us to get together, then you
said we're breaking up. Now you want to get
back together again?
<PAGE>
...Do you really mean it this time?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
<WINDOW_HEART1_R>*sigh* Why did I have to fall for someone so
fickle?
<PAGE>
Though I'm even madder at myself, because I
can't say this isn't exactly what I want.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE><ACTION_RIBBON>Okay. I'll accept that ring. But only if you
promise me we won't ever talk about breaking
up again!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So...now what? We're back together again, so
do you want to come up with new nicknames?
No, let's keep them the same.
Sure! Let's see...

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're okay with <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE>?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Right. I'm looking forward to being back
together with you, then, <MYNAME>. For keeps,
this time!

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Did you really mean what you said earlier? Do
you honestly want us to get back together
again?
<PAGE>
That is so self-centered I still can't believe it.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_HEART1_R>I see. You do mean it. Well, then of course I'll
say yes.
<PAGE>
Even after we broke up, I couldn't forget a thing
about you. I'm so glad to have you back.
<PAGE>
<ACTION_RIBBON>Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, I know. Since we're finally back together
again...
<PAGE>
...why don't we give ourselves new nicknames,
to commemorate our fresh start? Well?
Let's keep our names the same.
I wanna change my name.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You want me to call you <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE>, then?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
There. Okay, <MYNAME>...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I'm looking forward to being with you again. For
good, this time.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Goodness gracious! Do you have any willpower
to commit to a decision at all?!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Though...does this second confession mean you
have finally realized what a beautiful and alluring
a person I am?
<PAGE>
They do say sometimes you only realize what
you had once you lose it. And ever since we
broke up, I've missed you so much--
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Er, nothing! You heard nothing!!
<PAGE>
A-anyway, show that ring to me again!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_HEART1_R><ACTION_RIBBON>Ohoho! I suppose I might accept this ring from
you, benevolent lady that I am. Be thankful!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now then, shall we take this opportunity to give
ourselves new nicknames? I'll allow you to give
an opinion on the matter.
Let's keep our names the same.
I wanna change my name.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So you prefer <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE>?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Excellent. Now the two of us are committed to
each other once again.
<PAGE>
And I will expect you to treat me even more
preciously, to make up for having left me once!
Understand, <MYNAME>? Good.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
From what you mentioned earlier, is it all right
for me to assume that you'd like us to get back
together again?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_HEART1_R>All right. Yes, there are a few things I have
questions about...
<PAGE>
but you really are saying you want me back.
That's enough for me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I've been waiting a good long while to hear you
say exactly that.
<PAGE>
<ACTION_RIBBON>Thank you, <MYNAME>. Let's try again.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's not every day a couple has a real chance to
start over. How about we give ourselves new
nicknames for the occasion?
Let's keep our names the same.
I wanna change my name.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You'd like me to call you <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE>?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I'm quite looking forward to being back with you
as your partner again, <MYNAME>. Hopefully for
good.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Oh my gosh, I can't believe this. I thought it was
hopeless...!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>You were my first crush. Even after we broke up,
I still couldn't forget you.
<PAGE>
I tried. I really did. But I didn't know how, and
thinking about you hurt so much.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>So if you want to be with me again, that... That
makes me so happy...

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_HEART1_R><ACTION_RIBBON>Of course I'll accept your ring.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Oh, I know! Since we're getting back together as
b-boyfriend and girlfriend, how about we give
each other new nicknames?
Let's keep our names the same.
I wanna change my name.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE>, then?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Great! So, um...I'm glad we can be together
again, <MYNAME>. I'm really looking forward to
it.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow! Even after breaking up, we still can read
each other's minds!
<PAGE>
See, I was thinking the same thing right now.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I'd just decided to go ask you if you'd let me be
your girlfriend again.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_HEART1_R><ACTION_RIBBON>Yes, of course I'll accept your ring! It would
make me super happy to do so.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Oh, I know! How about we give ourselves new
nicknames to commemorate getting back
together?
No, I like our names as they are.
Sure! Let's see...

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You want me to call you <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE>, then?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Okay! I'm really super happy to be back together
with you again. I'm looking forward to us being
lovey-dovey for a long time to come!

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
First you wanted us to date, then you wanted us
to break up. Now you want to date again. You
are a very busy person, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I must admit that, unfortunately, I have harbored
unrequited feelings for you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>However, I dislike making the same mistake a
second time.
<PAGE>
If you truly want to be with me again, show me
that ring and promise you will work to keep our
relationship whole.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_HEART1_R><ACTION_RIBBON>All right. If you insist, I'll agree to try again, just
this once.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Now then, what say we take this opportunity to
give ourselves new nicknames? I'm open to
suggestions, of course.
Let's keep our names the same.
I wanna change my name.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You'd like me to call you <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE>, now?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Excellent. I look forward to being your girlfriend
again, <MYNAME>. Hopefully for good.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
First you say you want us to break up, but now
you come back and say you want us to be
together again. What are you thinking?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I can't understand this behavior in the least. But
there's one thing I understand even less...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>And that's the question of how I could still be so
much in love with you, even after everything
that's happened.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>...Are you sure you want me to have
that ring?
<PAGE>
Can I truly be your girlfriend again?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_HEART1_R><ACTION_RIBBON>Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Now then, seeing as we have returned to our
prior relationship...
<PAGE>
How about we give ourselves new nicknames to
reflect that? What do you think?
Let's keep our names the same.
I wanna change my name.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So you want me to call you <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE> now?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Good. I am very much looking forward to being
with you again, <MYNAME>. Forever this time.
